title: Does Strictly Come Dancing's Kelvin Fletcher have dance experience?
text:
It didn’t take him long to look like a natural (Picture: BBC)

Kelvin Fletcher’s performance on Strictly Come Dancing 2019 has been nothing short of iconic.

From lighting up the dancefloor to earn a score of 32 out of 40 on the first week and not showing signs of stopping since, he’s won over millions of fans.

The ex-Emmerdale actor collected the highest score in week one and has consistently scored in the top end of the leaderboard since, sparking speculation that he could take home the Glitterball.

So what is Kelvin’s background on the boards? Here’s what we know about the suave stud…

Has Strictly Come Dancing’s Kelvin Fletcher been a dancer before?

Speaking on his Strictly VT, Kelvin admitted that he really hasn’t had any previous dance experience – but he’s no stranger to putting on a show.

Oldham-born Fletcher played Andy Sugden on Emmerdale between 1996 and 2016.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The actor has also appeared on Heartbeat, Chiller, Cracker and Three Seven Eleven, although he has now turned to the British GT Championship as a racer.

Introducing him as a contestant in the show’s first week, Kelvin said of his dance experience: ‘My experience of dancing is exclusively at weddings or parties with alcohol involved and in the dark…’

Kelvin, 35, only started training after being asked to replace Jamie Laing on the show, but it turns out Jamie’s loss was the viewer’s gain.

His success week-after-week on the show certainly proves that sometimes dancers are born, not made.

His dedication to his physique is certainly helping his chances (Picture: Wenn/Instagram)

Lapping up the applause after his first performance as he cantered off the stage alongside Oti, Fletcher said: ‘I’m absolutely overjoyed – I really am.’

Strictly Come Dancing continues on BBC One on Sunday.

MORE: What time is Strictly Come Dancing’s results show tonight and how many celebs have been eliminated so far?

MORE: Chris Ramsey thinks ‘being sexy’ will prove to be downfall on Strictly Come Dancing
description: Kelvin Fletcher has become a fan-favourite on Strictly Come Dancing with sexy sambas and high scores. Has he had previous dance experience?
